extensionAttribute.description: Reports the installed version of Yammer for Mac
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/sh if [ -d /Applications/Yammer.app ]; then AppVersion=`/usr/bin/defaults read /Applications/Yammer.app/Contents/Info.plist CFBundleShortVersionString` echo "<result>$AppVersion</result>" else echo "<result>Not installed</result>" fi
exit 0
